title: FAIR Digital Operation Type Profiles
description: This schema describes the structure of a FAIR Digital Operation Type Profile. FAIR Digital Operation Type Profiles are used to describe the technology and attributes of a FAIR Digital Operation.

pid.title: PID
pid.description: A automatically generated persistent identifier referring to this operation type profile.

name.title: Type Name
name.description: A human readable name for the operation type profile

description.title: Description
description.description: A human readable description of the operation type profile

createdAt.title: Creation date
createdAt.description: The date when this operation type profile was created in RFC 3339 format.

lastModifiedAt.title: Modification date
lastModifiedAt.description: The date when this operation type profile was lastly modified in RFC 3339 format.

license.title: License
license.description: The license of this operation type profile. It is a PID or URL pointing to a license.

items.title: Provenance information
items.description: Information about a person, group, or organization.

type.title: Type of the provenance information
type.description: The type specifies the kind of reference to the subject. It can be a URL, a Handle, an ORCiD, or some plain text.

url.title: URL
url.description: A URL referring to a person, group, or organization. When ORCiD is chosen as a type, this refers to the ORCiD profile.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of a person, group, or organization

email.title: E-Mail address
email.description: An email address for a person, group, or organization

attributes.title: Attributes
attributes.description: Definition of the attributes this operation type profile uses. The attributes are used to describe the input an operation uses to produce an output.

pid.title: PID
pid.description: PID referring to the data type or type profile this attribute uses

description.title: Description
description.description: Description of how this data type/type profile is used in this context

obligation.title: Obligation
obligation.description: Describes if this property is optional or mandatory to be specified in the operation.

defaultValue.title: Default Value
defaultValue.description: A default value can be provided here. Needs to be a string representation of a JSON object that is compatible with these restrictions. String delimiters need to be escaped

constantValue.title: Constant Value
constantValue.description: Used if the type has a constant value on all possible instances for this parameter. This value cannot be changed in the Operation. Needs to be a string representation of a JSON object that is compatible with these restrictions. String delimiters need to be escaped

adapters.title: List of adapters
adapters.description: A list of adapters for the FAIR Digital Operation Type Profile. Adapters are used to provide the technology-specific implementation of a FAIR Digital Operation Type Profile.

items.title: Adapter
items.description: A reference to an adapter for the technical specification of a FAIR Digital Operation Type Profile.
